Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near Irving Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem near Irving Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to a signal problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
